item.title: Chasing autumn: a farewell to the season
item.description: As the chill of autumn started to creep in, I convinced my friend Kim to embark on a farewell ride to the season. Our rendezvous point was the local gas station at 10:00 am on a crisp Sunday morning. We charted our course, and with the hum of our engines beneath us, we set off. The journey to our destination was a reminder that winter was knocking at the door - the cold was penetrating.
